Text:
Mother of god, man. Your encoding is EPIC. 

I got a 1080p, 8000kbps, 8gb filesize to crossreference frames with your upload... Your 4gb upload is 99% identical in quality as the 8gb I found.

I wish everyone knew this. I wish every uploader used your settings. Just wanted to thank you, techrod!

LOL! humpdonkey, I really appreciate praise from someone who's taken the time to do a side-by-side. Compressing is half-science, half-art, so it's nice to know I'm doing well on both fronts. :)

Things will be quiet for about 10 days (sorry) but I'll be back with a vengeance...
@iclouds - yes, I'm gonna do "The Grey" when I'm back home but that means it probably won't be uploaded for at least 6 days (in case it matters)
I made an account to ask you this, how do you put the artwork on your movies?
